strapiPost.title: A Wave of Music
strapiPost.content:
If you're new to the newsletter or you've missed the past few weeks of newsletters, there has been a resurgence of live music, festivals, and events popping up on the calendar in NWA. The upcoming lineup of events is too good for us not to mention again...

  • Artosphere: Arkansasâ€™ Arts+Nature Festival, returns May 6-23 with events across Northwest Arkansas.
  • Neighborhood Concert Series: DBI and City Sessions bring you live music in the neighborhoods, parks, and lots with their monthly series. Dates can be found HERE.
  • Roots HQ on the Avenue: An outdoor street concert series that takes place in downtown Fayetteville. Checkout the line up HERE.
  • Freshgrass Festival: Music festival celebrating today's bluegrass and roots music at the Momentary Oct. 1-2.

Check out the other festivals and events happening this year HERE. Rock on.
